name: Coffee Break (itch) (zoby1018)
description:
Coffee Break is a Point-n-Click Adventure game where most of the Key Items are gained through chance by the Patent Pending Sahara (Tool-Spin) Vending Machines throughout the building. Spend Vouchers to obtain useful tools & prizes. Run out of Tickets? Don't worry, because the newest version of the Tool-Spin now allows customers to pay in a variety of new options.

Congrats on becoming a brand new hire for Sahara, the Oasis of the Desert. Sahara is the largest manufacturing, shipping, and developing company in the world. Today is your first day and the receptionist gave you an itinerary. Looks like the first thing on the list is to get coffee for the boss. Talk about a good opportunity to make a great first impression with the head of the company.
